name: Apple Pie
description: A sweet pie filled with spiced apples.

ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, cold and cubed
steps: Mix flour, salt, sugar. Cut in butter till crumbly. Add water, form dough, chill 1 hr.
Mix apples with sugars, spices, flour, lemon juice.
Place dough in pie dish, fill with apples, dot with butter.
Cover with crust, seal, cut slits.
Bake at 425°F for 20 mins, then 375°F for 35–40 mins.

name: Samosa
description: A fried or baked pastry with a savory filling.

steps: Mix flour, oil, salt, and water to form dough. Rest 30 mins.
Heat oil, add cumin, ginger, peas, spices, mashed potatoes. Cool filling.
Roll dough, cut into halves, form cone, fill, and seal.
Deep fry till golden and crisp.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with garlic and parmesan.

steps: Cook pasta and set aside.
In a pan, melt butter, sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add cream, simmer, stir in parmesan.
Add pasta, toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Lentils cooked with spices and tempered with ghee.

steps: Pressure cook dal with water, turmeric, salt till soft.
In another pan, heat ghee, add cumin, mustard, garlic, hing.
Add onions, tomatoes, green chili, cook till soft.
Add cooked dal, simmer 5–10 mins.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice or roti.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate layered cake.

steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour cake pans.
Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, oil, vanilla. Beat well.
Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour into pans and bake 30–35 mins.
Cool and frost as desired.
